laboratory_examinations.findings: Multicystic intradural extramedullary mass extending from L3 till the sacrococcyx, and a paravertebral multivesicular cystic mass with extension toward the iliac fossa.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Control MRI 1 month later showed significant improvement of the intradural component; MRI after 10 months showed further reduction of lesion size and disappearance of the daughter cysts but no cyst calcification.
